problem.markdown:
>>The definition which best describes a Markov process is:<<
( ) A progression for an area of a snowflake which converges to 8/5 times the area of a triangle, while the progression for the snowflake's perimeter diverges to infinity. The snowflake itself has a finite area bounded by an infinitely long line. (x) A stochastic process in which the probability of finding X at some value at time t+δt depends only on the value of X at time t ( ) A mathematical model of conflict and cooperation between intelligent rational decision-makers ( ) A stochastic process in which the probability of finding X at some value at time t+δt doesn’t depend solely on the value of X at time t
